text: George Whelan (born 1934), is a male former boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== He represented England in the -60 kg division at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. He was the 1954 ABA lightweight champion and took part in 22 professional contests. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:English male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people Category:Lightweight boxers
title: George Whelan (boxer)
